answers.answer: I have never been on oral drugs for diabetes, so I can't really comment on this.  However, I do know that I have had similar side effects from other drugs.  He can look at the drug insert and see if this is one of the side effects.  But even if it's not, it may be worth trying one of the other oral medications for diabetes. As always, have him talk to his doctor about this to rule out any other problems and to see waht else he may be able to try.Es
